details.title: We make paying your bill easy!
Payment Options
details.description: - Cheque or cash can be sent with your driver. - Cheques can be mailed to our office: 20414 Douglas Crescent, Langley, BC V3A 4B4. Please make sure you include the client's name if you are paying on behalf of someone else. - Pay over the phone with a credit card. Call 604.533.1679 Monday through Friday between 9:00am and 3:00pm - Setup a credit card over the phone to automatically pay your invoice at the end of each month. - Pay with cash, cheque or a debit/credit card at our office Monday through Friday between 9:00am and 3:00pm

details.title: On-line Payment Options
details.description: - Pay with interac e-transfer. Send payments to info@lmow.ca and ensure you reference the client's name. - Pay with PayPal. Enter your name and total payment, and then click the PayPal button below.
